mapper.sql: device_id, user_id, device_token, device_type, create_at, update_at
mapper.select:
select
from czb_remote_push where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
mapper.update: update czb_remote_push set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_token = #{deviceToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
